captions.text: Star media presents
Igor Petrenko
Ekaterina Klimova
Alexei Komashko
Polya Polyakova
Alexander Mokhov
Natalia Vasko
Alexander Kobzar
Stop it, musketeers! Be careful!
Alexandra Kireyeva
in a movie
DREAMS MODELLED FROM CLAY

Borya! Stop fooling around! Tell
my wife that the meat is ready!
Let’s sit down at the table!

Tell my husband that he is
the only one we’re waiting for!

Sergey Petrovitch, you’re the
only one we’re waiting for!

Come here! Look, go to Oxana
and tell her to come here.

I don’t know what the
problem is. She is either shy

or she doesn’t like our
adult company. Go, go!
All right.
Meow! Oxana, you’re doing so well!
You have already told me about that!

I have! And I haven’t!
Oxana, I’ll never get tired

of saying it again and
again! I’m telling everybody
that I know a very talented girl!

She’ll become a famous
artist when she grows up.

And I’ll be proud to
be her childhood friend!
You’re teasing me!
No, I’m not.
Shall we go?
Where to?
To the guests.
I’m bored with them!

I promise, you won’t be bored. Come on!
I need everybody to be there! Come on!

My dear friends! A very
difficult project is at last over!

My congratulations! We’ll have
new projects, I’m sure of that!
Can I have a moment of your attention?

Today people whom I love
and who I care for have gathered here.
I hope my feelings are mutual.

That’s why I want to inform
you on a very important

and happy event that is about
to take place in my life!

I asked for Victoria’s hand and
she agreed to become my wife!

Bravo! Vika, bravo!
Borya! My congratulations!
This is a reason to drink!
My congratulations! Congratulations!
Oxana, can you be more careful?

Oxana, you’re so clumsy! I’m sorry;
she didn’t do that on purpose. Oxana!

It’s all right! We shall
spray your dress with salt!

What salt? Do you want to
pepper me too? I need to change.

Did you do that on purpose?
Oxana, answer me!
You did it on purpose, didn’t you?

Yes, I did it on purpose!
It’s because I love Borya!
Stop it! This is nonsense!
It’s not nonsense!

Borya is an adult and
you’re a little girl!
He loves Vika and they’ll get married.
They won’t!

They will! He asked for
Vika’s hand and she agreed.

It’s so cruel of you!
Don’t you want Borya to be happy?
I do! I’ll grow up and marry him!
Hello.

The meeting at the mayor’s
office is scheduled for Tuesday.
All amendments shall be ready by then.
This is the agreement.

Sergey Petrovitch,
has something happened?
Did I do something wrong?
You?
No, you have nothing to do with it.

Why are you standing? Sit
down. Come on, sit down.

I never praised you much.
Our business is cruel
and has no place for emotions.
But this is what I want to tell you.
You’re the only person in our company
whom I really care for! This is true!
Thank you, Sergey Petrovitch!

Many people are scared
of the new deputy mayor.

They are right to be afraid.
Turkin is a terrible person.
I heard many bad things about him.

When mayor retires
Turkin will replace him.
Will it influence us?

What do you think? It’s all
right. “We shall try him first”,

said the tigers on
seeing their new trainer.
Work on the agreement!
We’ll do everything, Sergey Petrovitch!
Come here!
Vika! What does that mean?
What do you mean?
“Borya and I decided to get married!”
Oh, you mean this…

Look, Vika, why do I
know nothing about it?
Why didn’t you tell me about this?
What is going on between Borya and you?
What do you mean – what? Borya loves me.

He has been in love
with me for a long time.

So I thought it over
and decided… why not?

Borya is not a stranger for me!
I won’t let you spoil his life!

"Why spoil? I need a family.
Borya will make a good husband; "
one can see that at once!

Look, dear… are you
trying to blackmail me?

Is this game with the wedding
just a trick to make me
change something in our relations?

No! I know very well that it
is impossible to make you do

what you don’t want to do. But
I have to sort my own life out.

I’m going to marry
Borya, that’s true. But…
I am doing it for a reason.

I don’t believe you! You
just want to make me mad.
You don’t love Borya, I know!
You’re right.
I don’t love him.

But… Borya will make a
good father for my baby.

What baby? Are you pregnant from Borya?
How interesting!

Did it start a long
time ago between you?

It has only started recently.
And the baby I’m expecting is…

Yours! I started an
affair with Borya later,
when I got to know that I was pregnant!
Women are so mean!

Didn’t I warn you that
I won’t leave my family?
I’m not counting on you! As you can see,
I solve my problems myself!

Really? Is that a way
to solve the problem?

You want to make Borya
bring up another man’s child!

Don’t you have enough
brains to understand
that this is indecent?

Stop talking about decency!
I’m trying to protect my child!
I want him to have a family!

Look, Vika! There is a simpler
way to solve this problem.
No! No! I want to have this child!

I want him to be happy,
do you understand?

I want him to have a normal
family with mum and dad!
Yes!

But you chose not the
best moment for this story.
My anniversary is approaching…

Serezha, children decide when
to be born for themselves!

Please understand! I’m
not worrying about myself!
I’m thinking about our baby!
Look, Vika! Please give me time!

I’ll take the decision
right after the anniversary!
Yes.

Seryozha, Oxana, it’s time to get
prepared! You have two minutes.
All right, mum.
Right. Ksyusha, hi! Do you like it?
It’s OK.

What do you mean –
OK? Come here! Come on!
Here you go! Do you like it now?
I like it, I do.
Dad, do you love mum?

Of course! Why are you
asking such silly questions?
Vika doesn’t love Borya.
Why? Why do you think so?
She looks at him so… indifferently!

You’re wrong, daughter.
You must have been mistaken.

Catch me! Come on, catch
up with me! Come on!
This is unfair!
Dad, you lost!
Anastasia!
Yes?
You’re so beautiful today!

The same goes for
you. Come on, Seryozha.

It’s impolite to make
the guests wait for us.
Asya?
What?
Nothing.
Why are you looking at me like that?

Asya, I know that life with
me is not a piece of sugar.

You’re so funny today! Of
course it’s not a piece of sugar!
What’s the matter? It was a joke!
I’m joking! I feel good with you.

Even when you come from
work tired and irritated

I still love you! I love
you very, very, very much!

When you agreed to become
my wife fifteen years ago

I was in heaven from
happiness! We had good times

and difficult times but we
never had bad times. I’m lucky!

My wife is beautiful, clever
and most importantly kind!
I’m waiting for a corrected technical

and economical substantiation
of this project, a detailed list

of the roads that are being
constructed or repaired.
All right.

You’re a clever guy. You
prepared a good agreement.

My lawyers spoke well of
you. There are some issues,

but they are minor.
Work on it some more!
Sure, Arkadiy Mikhaylovitch!

The agreement, the agreement!
How many times can we correct it?

Until Turkin sees his
own interest in it!
Do you think so?
I don’t think so, I know.
Come on!
Sergey Petrovitch!
Yes?
There are good news too.
I’m listening.
Vika is pregnant! We’ll have a baby!
Really?
Yes!
Congratulations!

Now you have to marry
her as soon as possible.

Why? Girls like narrow
dresses. Time flies!

In a few months you won’t be able
to shove her tummy in a dress.
I’ll pay for the restaurant! Come on!
Hello. Good afternoon! Hello.

– Hello.
– Come on.
Hello.
Has something happened?
You’re fired. Prepare the papers.
Really? Why is that?
For what reason? Maybe I work badly?
Or the reason for my firing is personal?
I told you to wait!

You decided to run before
the train, didn’t you?
You may run if you want to!
I don’t understand.
You don’t understand, do you?

What did you tell Borya
that you’re pregnant for?

When he didn’t know about that
we could change the situation!
Now there are no other options!

– Really?
– Really.

Did they really exist,
these “other options”?
They did!

I’ve seen it all! You
love your wife, don’t you?

You’ll never leave her. It
seemed to me that I was younger

and more beautiful. But
there must be something
more important than that. Am I right?
You’re right. You did well.

I could rent you a flat
and pay yours and the baby’s expenses.

But I won’t be able to
live with two families.

I don’t want to lie!
Lies would accumulate.
Nobody would win out of that!
Yes, Borya will make a good husband!
He’ll be a great father for your child!
Borya, congratulations!
Thanks you!
Borya, you’re great!
Be happy.
Be sure, I will!
My dear…
Oxana, aren’t you sleeping?
Again? You shouldn’t worry so much!

Your entire life is ahead of
you! You‘ll have many good events!
Like what?
Happiness, joy and love!
I won’t have any of those!

You will if you wish for that
very much. I’ll tell you a secret.

When I was a little girl my mum and I
always spent summer in the country.

We used to rent a
house of one old woman.

That very old woman told me
that if I wished for something

really strongly I should
make it out of flour and salt!

I liked one boy from that village,
but he paid no attention to me.
So I made a large heart

and wished for him to
fall in love with me.
Did he fall for you?

He did! He was running
after me that entire summer!

You’ll be all right,
my dear! Good night!
Good night!
Stop, stop, stop! Get off!

Look, I don’t like it.
Check it one more time.

Yes, Arkadiy Mikhaylovitch,
I’m listening.
Yes. I got you. Yes!

Hey? Is that true that
this road will be repaired?

It will not only be
repaired but broadened!

We’ll do away with the
old one and construct

a new road using the
latest technologies!

I hope there will be
no potholes anymore.
There will be none!

This is a lie! Potholes
appear every spring.
You repair it every year,

and then each spring
we get new potholes!

Buy some pies! I’ll give
them to you for half price!
Nobody is buying them anyway today!
All right. I’ll buy some for my boss.

He is in low spirits
today. He must be hungry.

I see. I understand,
Arkadiy Mikhaylovitch.

I got you! I’ll be at
your office by four!

Sergey Petrovitch! These are
pies from the happy locals
who are grateful for the future road!

Turkin has just called
me! There will be no road!
What do you mean?
This is what I mean!
The machines are already here!
They’ll go away.
I feel ashamed before the locals!

We’ll see. I have a
meeting with Turkin today.

Mikhalitch! Don’t start
working, wait for my call!

Did we understand each
other, Sergey Petrovitch?
Yes. You didn’t leave me any choice.

This is not so. There is
always a choice! Come with me!
Do you know this place?
Of course I do.

The forest, a lake with the
cleanest water, pikeperch,
other fish… Do you like fishing?
I do.

I love it too. So… Our
administration was allotted land

to build cottages there.
The prices are low.

Go there and choose a
land lot for yourself!
Why? I don’t work at the administration.

So what? You’re one of us,
and we value our people!

By the way, I think that
your company may build a road

to the cottages. So?
Is there a choice or not?
I have to think it over.

Will you have a chicken
or a cutlet with potatoes?

The soup isn’t ready yet but
I have some yesterday’s bortsh.
Or do you want some salad?
Seryozha, are you asleep? Seryozha?
This is a very good project.
How interesting!

The inside plan may be different
depending on the family.
Do you have small children?

No, we don’t plan to have babies.
We have a 12-year old daughter.

She is very interested in modeling.
We hope she’ll be an artist.

We’d like her to have a small workshop,
don’t we, Seryozha?
Yes, of course!

Then… one second! You
shall look at this project.
There is a room under the roof here.

It’s a bit more expensive,
though… for about 15 per cent.
I think we can manage it.
Very good.
Is mum still swimming?
No.
I see.
Sergey Petrovitch?
Yes?

We caught such bog fishes!
I know what to give you

for your birthday now!
Fish rods of all sizes!

Wait till you see what fish one
may catch by our future cottage!

You know, Asya and I
visited the place yesterday.

She was so excited she
barely slept at night!

We can’t afford a cottage
yet! But we don’t need it,

on the other hand! We’re
thinking about a large flat!
What are you talking about?
I was saying that we want to buy a flat.

We’ll also rent a cottage
for summer somewhere nearby.

Sergey Petrovitch, what is
we become your neighbors?
I'm all for it!
The boy will feel good there!

Vika? Do you know for sure
that you’ll have a boy?
We’re waiting and hoping!

Look after the fish!
I’ll bring you the plan
of the future cottage. I want to boast!

It’s good that you’re frying
fish! I’ll go to the house

to brew us some tea.
Do you want something?
No, thank you!
I can’t believe your heartlessness!

I’m sorry, I was tactless!
You’re so irritable today!
What’s the matter? Do you feel unwell?

I feel bad! I didn’t
expect it to be so bad!

Vika, it’s quite normal
in your situation.

I’m not talking about
pregnancy! I feel bad morally!

I thought that I could lie
for the sake of the baby,

but I can’t! I think about it
every night when I go to bed

with Boris! The more loving
he is with me the worse I feel.
I don’t want to know any details!
Seryozha, I feel bad without you!

And you don’t even
want to listen me out!
Yes, I don’t want to listen to you!

You said that you’d solve
your problems yourself!
I offered you a different solution!

What kind of solution was
that? To kill your own baby!

Why are you shouting?
Why are you shouting?
Do you want everybody to hear you?
Let go of my hand! It hurts!
Yes! Let everybody know!

Vika! Vika, don’t do
anything silly! Vika!
Doctor? How is she?

Your wife is all right. But she
lost the baby. I’m very sorry.
I can’t believe it!

He existed
this morning, and now he is gone!

I was trying to imagine
what he’d be like.
I was thinking of a name for him.

I feel sorry for Vika.
It’s so hard for her!

I feel bad. Can you
imagine how bad she feels?

I wish you knew how
well I understand you!
Oxana, may I sit with you?

Mummy, please forgive
me! I didn’t want to!
What are you talking about?
I didn’t want Borya’s baby to die!

God, what are you saying? You
have nothing to do with that!

I wanted something to happen
to make Borya and Vika separate!

But I didn’t think that it’d
happen this way! Mummy, forgive me!
Forget about this nonsense right now!

Do you remember telling me to
model my dream? I did it and…
I… I wanted you to…
I’ll destroy that silly palace!
No! Don’t destroy it! It’s great!
You better model a different prince!
Vika, have some tea.
I don’t want to.
Drink some!
I don’t want to!

Vika, I know how hard it is for
you! I want to help you so much!

Honey, I love you! I
can’t forgive myself

for not being by your side
then! I’d have caught you!
I doubt it.

It’s all right. We’ll
be together from now on.
I’ll always be close by!
I want to sleep very much. I’m sorry.
Vika? What a surprise!
Hello.
Hello.
How are you feeling?
OK.

Look, Vika… I feel sorry that
it happened like this, really!
I feel sorry too. Seryozha…
I’m free now! Do you understand?
What do you mean? You’re Borya’s wife!
You know that I don’t love him!

I only married him for
the sake of the child.

And now there is no child, so
I want to restore our relations!

It’s not that easy! We can’t
pretend that nothing happened!
We can’t restore our relations!
Hire me again! I…
I just want to be close to you!

Look, Vika… don’t do anything
silly. I’m older than you

and I have a right to
give you a piece of advice.

You shall be more serious!
A decent man is in love with you.
You shall appreciate that!

Is that all? Thank for you
your advice. I’ll pay attention.
10 years afterwards…
It’s all right, I’ll clean it!
Are you feeling unwell?
I’m all right. I’m fine.

I’ll measure your
pressure when we’re home!

Look, do you think
I’m a pensioner, Asya?

Why a pensioner? Again? You’ll
drop it! You shall grow up!

What are you doing?
Oxana, hold the watermelon!
Hi, dad!

Hi, teacher! How are the
things going at school?
Great!
Do you have a new group?
There are so small and funny!

I asked them by call
me by my father’s name.

They did it by the end of the
lesson. Ksyusha Sergeyevna!

I see. Girls, I’ll go
to the summer cottage.
I’ll be back by about 11. Kisses! Bye!
Malenko can’t be reached on his mobile.
Call him at home!
I called him trice but he won’t answer.

Look, I understand
that we made a mistake.

What a great mistake! It
costs about three million…

and eight years in prison! If
you don’t solve this problem today

you’ll pay for it! The mayor
doesn’t like such situations.
I’ll find Malenko!

Sergey Petrovitch! Sergey
Petrovitch! I beg your pardon,
but I couldn’t reach you on the phone.

The machines failed to come
to Lugovaya. Turkin is mad.

We shall go there and
sort the things out!

To Lugovaya! Why did the
machines fail to come?
I don’t know. We shall go there!

Look, Borya, I… I feel unwell.
Let’s talk in the fresh air.
Is it your heart again?
Yes, I feel heartache sometimes.
Shall I take you to the hospital?

No, no! I took some pills
so I think I’ll be fine.
Is that so serious?
They threatened to sue us!

Borya, you’re a genius
lawyer! Think of something!
I’d have already done that if I could.

Go to the office. I’ll feel
better in an hour or two

and come to you. Try
to win us some time.
Seryozha, where are you?
Vika?
Hi, Borya.
What are you doing here?

I’m watering the
flowers. Are you an idiot?
Please go inside. We need to talk.

What are you doing, fool?
You shall be grateful to him!

You only have what you
have thanks to Seryozha!
I don’t care for the whore’s opinion!

Shut your mouth! I’m not a
whore! We love each other!
I only married you because of the baby!

Do you know whose baby
it was? It was his baby!
It was his and not yours!
No, you’re a not a whore. You’re worse.
I understand you!
I’d do the same way if I were you.

Everything in life comes
back, Sergey Petrovitch.
If I were you… I’d keep looking around.
Borya, we’re adults. Let’s talk!
About what?

I don’t want to justify myself!
You’re very good, I know!

This is a key from the
old flat and a card.
You’ll have more than enough money.
What about you?
I’ll go away.
For long?
What do you care?
I don’t care!
Damn it!

You’re a fool! You
won’t find the documents!

I have a video too! One can
see who gives who the money…
I can’t do it!

Don’t hurry up! You distribute
the force unevenly. Try again.
How do you like it?

It’s very good. The class
is finished for today.

Put your clay and knives
back in your boxes and…
Go to wash the hands!
Very good!

Uncle Kolya! Uncle Kolya!
We were doing sausages and I did well!
Very good! Hi!
There were not sausages but plaits! Hi!

Kolya, tell Ira’s parents
to buy her a normal
domestic-produced clay!
All right. How many lessons do you have?
One.

Let me come for you
after I take Ira home!
We could go somewhere.

I can’t make it today. I
have to be at home with mum!
Has something happened?
No. But it’s my dad’s death anniversary.
I could help somehow.

Thank you! But we want to
spend some time at home alone.
All right. See you tomorrow, then! Bye!
Mum! Let’s go to our old summer cottage!
Dad used to love it so much!

I think he would be
happy if we visited it!

I can’t! I can’t come in
our former living-room!
I can’t see that armchair!
Let’s sell it, then!

Stop it! No! We have
sold everything we had!

He used to love that summer
cottage! He grew up there!
We’ll go! We’ll go there for sure!
Tomorrow!

Do you still live in
your childhood dreams?
I think Nicolay loves you.

Love may be different. One may
dream and make clay palaces.

One may just feel good
with another person.

The main thing is to feel that
he or she will never betray you!

Nicolay, thank you for giving us a lift.
I hope you’ll have supper with us.
Why not?
Oxana, do we have wine at home?

Oxana, do we have some
wine? Do you hear me?
Oxana, do you hear me? Oxana?
Yes! We have some wine, mum!
Or would you like something stronger?

I may drink something
stronger. But in this case

I’ll have to leave the
car at the parking lot.

I forgot about something.
I have to get some materials
for tomorrow’s lesson!

I may buy them for
you, it’s not a problem!

No, thank you! I’ll go out in
the Gorkiy street. It’s nearby.

Take mum home, and I’ll be back
by the time you have the car parked!
As you say.
Hello, Vika? This is me.

Borya? Borya, where are
you? Have you come back?

Yes, I’m back. Vika, we
need to meet and talk.
Are you home? Do you want me to come?

No, not today. It’s already
late. Let’s meet tomorrow.
All right.
Sorry, I’ll call you back.
All right. I’ll be waiting for you call.
Oxana? Hello.
Hello?
Good evening.
Come in, come in.
Hello?
You changed so much during this year!

Why are we standing in
the hall? Come in! Come in!

What would you like to
drink? Tea or coffee?
Maybe be some wine?

Thank you, but I’ll have
nothing. I came just for a minute.

I’m sorry to have come
without calling you.

But I didn’t know where to call.
Your former number doesn’t work.
I have a new number now. Put it down!

Thank you! But I don’t
think I’ll need it.

Oxana, it’s not that
simple. I know that you
and Anastasia Georgiyevna are mad at me.
Borya, you were not a stranger for us!

Why did you disappear
when we felt so bad?
We were in such a trouble? Dad died.

The company went bankrupt.
We didn’t know anything

about business but we
had to sign some papers!

We had to take decisions!
We had to sell the cottage!

We didn’t have anybody to
ask for a piece of advice!

The only person we felt
we could count on was you!

Believe me, I’m very sorry
that it happened like that!
Can you explain why it happened so?
I can’t do that yet.
I’m sorry.

Oxana! Oxana! I understand that
you and your mum consider me

to be disloyal. I just can’t tell
you about everything right now!

I have to sort many things
out myself! Promise me –

when I can talk about
it you’ll hear me out!
I promise.

The prosecutor’s office
is investigating the murder
of Alexander Lavrentyev and his family.

The bodies of the businessman
and his wife with shotgun wounds
were found in Lavrentyev’s house.

The detectives believe
that the murder resulted

from entrepreneurial
activities of Lavrentyev.

He was the General Director of a company
that was constructing roads…

At last! We have been waiting
for you for so long, Oxana!

Mum? What is the reason
for the celebration?

We have a reason! The reason
is the girl whom I love!
Oxana! I want you to become my wife!
You’re a perfect couple!
Will you marry me?

Why didn’t you call me back?
I was waiting for you call.
We agreed to meet!
I’m sorry, I was busy.
Nothing changed here.

What could have changed?
Only one year passed.
How did you live during this year?
I lived through it.
Why aren’t you asking me about anything?
About what?
About how I lived through this year.
How did you live?
Not very well. I missed you very much!
Do you want some tea?
No, thank you!
Borya…

Borya, we have been
together for so many years!
We’re not strangers, are we?

We may try to start
from the very beginning.
I don’t think we should.

Borya, honey! Everything
will be different now.

Really, I promise! I was a
fool then. I understood nothing!

Borya, we have been together
for ten years! It might work out!
No, Vika, it won’t!
Shall I leave?
Let’s talk about the divorce.
Why are you in such a hurry?
Have you found a replacement for me?
No. I just want to arrange my affairs.
I see. Who is Oxana?
What does Oxana have to do with it?

Wait. Oxana… she must
be Sergey’s daughter!

Right! That little fool was
head over heels in love with you!

She did it, after all,
didn’t she? You did well too!
You revenged on him! Sergey would be mad

if he knew that you’re
sleeping with his daughter!

Now I want you to get up
and leave my apartment!
You’re a brat, Borya!
Hello, Anastasia Georgiyevna?
Hello. I didn’t expect to see you again.
I need to talk with Oxana.
Oxana is not home. She is at work.
Let’s talk!
There is nothing to talk about here.
I don’t want you to consider me scum!

I don’t think that your words
will change my opinion of you.

I understood one thing.
I realize that you had

some personal circumstances
but it doesn’t change anything.

I ask you to leave and
never to come back again.

It won’t bring joy to anyone!
Oxana is getting married.
Her fiance is about to come here.

Let’s not create
uncomfortable situation!

Boris, hello. How are you? Have
your solved all your problems?
I’m working on that.
Did you want to talk?

We have discussed
everything with your mum.

She told me that… She told me
that you’re getting married.
Congratulations!
Who is that serious guy?
He was daddy’s colleague.
I see.
Mister Turkin, according to our data

Lavrentyev’s company was
getting all the budget money
to construct and repair roads.
How would you comment on that?
Your data are absolutely correct!

How can you explain the conclusions
of the governor’s commission

that says: only thirty
per cent of the road works

are finished at the moment,
whereas all the budget money
had been spent?

The law enforcement authorities
are currently investigating

Lavrentyev’s activities.
And now I beg your pardon.
I’m very busy.
Be quick! Where are you?
I’ll be in a moment.
Bring me some cognac.
I see.

Damned journalists! They
are spreading the fire!
You were great!

Damn them! Let them
lie for their bribes!
But they’re fooling the population!

The people are talking
in their kitchens!
And then they lie to Ira!
What will she think about me?

She won’t think anything bad about you!
She adores you!

Let’s forget about them! I don’t
want to think about it anymore!
How is your love life?
I asked Oxana to be my wife.
Aren’t you in a hurry?
No.
I love her.
Do as you think fit.
He is stealing money! My dad said so!
My dad is good!
Ira!
And you’re a fool!
Stop it! Stop it, you two! Stop it!
What has happened? Are you all right?
I am.
Do you have any more lessons?
Just one.

I’ll take Ira home and come
back. Let’s go, fighter!
Will you tell me what has happened?

Oxana, may I invite
Turkin to our wedding?
Do as you think fit.

Sit down. Poor boss! Irra told
him everything about the school!

He was already mad at the journalists
after the press-conference.
Thank you.

Thanks. Oxana, you
should punish the boy…
with whom Ira fought at school.
What do you mean – punish?

I didn’t mean literally.
But you should make him stand
before the class and apologize.

No, Kolya, I won’t do that!
If your Turkin and his wife
need apologies let him call his parents!
Ira started it herself, by the way!
No, he provoked her! He hurt his father!

Frankly speaking, I’d act in
the same way if I were her!
Kolya, how old is he? Eight?
He is nine!
He said what he heard from his parents.

Do you think he understand
anything in such matters?

Everybody should
answer for his own acts!

Everybody says terrible
things about Turkin.
People say that he steals money.
Do you understand what you’re saying?
I’m saying what I heard!

They say he is responsible
for Lavrentyev’s murder!

Maybe these are rumors! But you
can’t shut everybody’s mouth!
That’s why the boy is not to blame!
You should cut these talks short!
All right, I’ll explain it differently.

You MUST make that boy
stand before the class
and apologize to Ira. This is it!
I don’t HAVE to do it!
I don’t owe anything to your Turkin!
Hello, Oxana? I need to talk to you!
Borya, this is not the best moment!

Oxana, you promised to hear
me out when I ask you about it!
Oxana, I’m not a stranger for you!

I can’t let you make a
mistake that you’ll regret!

I don’t understand what
you’re talking about!
You’re going to marry that man!

Why are you talking about him like that?
You don’t know him at all!
Unfortunately I know him very well!

Nicolay Rudenko is not just
Turkin’s personal driver.

He is his right hand, a
person for special assignments.

I have no doubts that the
bankruptcy of your father’s company

is Turkin’s fault! Rudenko has
something to do with his death!
My dad died of a heart attack!

In a moment that was most
convenient for Turkin!
I don’t believe it!

Oxana! I’m telling you about
it because I care about you.

When I saw you the
day before yesterday I…
It may sound foolish but …
something turned upside down in my soul.
I looked at you with different eyes!
Oxana, believe me, I care about you!
Oxana, Oxana!

The subscriber can’t be
reached at the moment…

I realized that my love to Vika and
the story with the baby… were a big lie.

That was the end.
I wanted to run away

somewhere, to disappear!
I couldn’t stay here any longer!

But time passed. It healed my
wounds. I decided to come back.
What for?
To find you.
Vika.

What a bad daughter I am!
I forgot to call my mum!
Mom.
Hello? Thanks God!

I’m sorry, mum, I forgot
to call and warn you!

Oxana, I called you at
home and at the mobile!

Where are you? How are you?
Is everything all right?
I’m at Borya’s place.
Where?

Let’s talk tomorrow, mum.
Believe me… everything is fine.
Good morning.
Hello, Nicolay. You scared me.

I so understand that
your fianc?e is not home!

You know, Anastasia Georgiyevna,
we quarreled a bit yesterday.

So she switched her phone
off. I can’t reach her!
She is at work!
At work… on Saturday?
Is it Saturday today? Well, I…
Have something happened?
Yes, Kolya. You know… Borya came back.
You saw him. He was here yesterday.
Yes, I know him.

This is silly, but she fell for
him when she was still a girl.
And now he came back… Do you understand?
I do.
Yes, mum?
Oxana, you can’t behave like this!
Mum, don’t shout, please! I’m an adult!

I’ll spend this night
in the summer cottage.

What do you mean – in the
summer cottage? I worry so much!

I want to be alone! I love
you very, very much! Kisses!
How much does it cost?
200 rubles! Do you want some pies?
No, thank you!

Hey, guy? Was it you who
was going to build a road
here about ten years ago?
Yes. It was me.

Where is your road built
with the latest technologies?

The administration
failed to allot the money.

You stole it! I thought that
you wouldn’t do anything,
just steal the money!
Thank you! Is everything all right?

Take it. It’s not us who
take decisions! Thank you!
Thank you too!
Thanks! Are you all right?

Your father and I had
to build a road here.
But we didn’t do that.
Look, guy! Be careful on our potholes!
Many cars were damaged here! Thieves!
Why did you fail to build the road?
Turkin stole the money!
Couldn’t father do anything about it?

He wanted to! This is
the root of the problem.
Borya?
Borya?
Borya?
Borya?
Borya?
Borya?
What are you doing here?
I was just thinking… I can’t sleep.

I thought maybe a
glass of wine will help.
Your father used to make great wine.
Why aren’t you sleeping?
I got scared.
Come on. Why did you get scared?
I woke up and didn’t see you.
I’m here.
Wait for a moment, I’ll come soon.

Oxana! Listen! Is it because
of that story with the boy?

No. I’m sorry, but it’s
much more complicated.

I’m guilty before you but…
I wanted to call you myself

and explain everything…
and give the ring back!
Look! Let’s discuss it now!

I’ll just have to take Ira
home. Let’s go together!
Have your lessons finished?
Yes, mum.

Can you come home? We
have to talk seriously!
Mum, I can’t come now.
You always say that you can’t!
Let’s talk in the evening.
All right. I’ll be waiting for you!
All right…
Dad! Dad, hi!
Oxana, explain what is going on.
All right. But let’s not talk here.

I’m sorry but I’m working.
All right, I’ll help you.

You wanted to say: “Sorry
but I don’t love you”. Right?

Who do you love? Borya?
What do you know about him?

The fact that he was tying
your laces in your childhood?

Do you know that he was stealing money
behind your father’s back?
This is a lie!

Why did money disappear from
your father’s account, then,

and you had to sell the
cottage to pay the debts?
How do you know?
Am I interfering?
No, no.
I’m leaving.

Stop it! Si down and let’s
talk. I knew your father.
He was a very honest and decent person.
But he was cheated on!

Somebody stole the
money from his account.

His accountant and lawyer
ran away. Your father wanted

to sort it out, but he
didn’t manage to do that!
His heart failed him!

Borya disappeared then and
now he came back unexpectedly.

Why? It must be because he
wants something from you.
What?

Maybe you have something
that you have no idea about.
I don’t understand anything!
All right. Don’t get excited.

My lawyer will call you soon.
Make a list of your wishes for him.
What if I want everything?
What do you mean?
This flat, the car, the rent!
You’re watching too many movies!

I’ll satisfy some of your
wishes if they are sound but…
Oxana, come in! Hi!
Has something happened?
Yes.
It’s so touching! I’ll start crying now!

Come in! Vika is leaving. We
were discussing our divorce.

I’m still your wife and I won’t
go anywhere. I won’t divorce you!
I better come later!
Oxana, stay, I beg you!

No no, don’t go! It’s
very good that you came.

You know, we had to meet some day
and to talk about everything.
Vika!
What are you afraid of? Are you afraid

that I’ll tell her that
her father was my lover?
Shall I tell her about the baby too?
I’m not interested!

Not interested? You should be!
I was pregnant from your father!
If I had wanted he would have left you

and your mum long ago! But
I was behaving decently!
What a fool! I married this no-gooder!

And now you want a divorce, don’t you?
This is what you’ll get! No divorce!
Borya, is that true?
Tell her, tell her!
This is true.

Let’s now talk about
Borya! How can you sleep
with a man who betrayed your father?
What are you saying?

The truth! You lost the
company and the cottage

because of him! Sergey
died because of him too!

What are you saying, idiot?
Oxana, don’t listen to her!
Can’t you see that she is drunk?

I’ll explain everything
to you. Give me the glass!
Hands off!
Give me the glass, I tell you!

Turkin has already
explained everything to me.
Why are you saying such things?
I know that they are true!
Get out of here!
Get out of here yourself!

Oxana, why are you so late?
We agreed to talk, didn’t we?
Oxana?
Mum, leave me alone, please.

Is it because of Boris? I
warned you not to listen to him.
Why are you so silly? He called you,

and you ran after him at once!
Love! Love! You found love!
What kind of love is that?

Mum! Love doesn’t exist!
It just doesn’t exist!

What are you saying?
Think about me and dad!
Hello. Yes, mum?
Ask somebody to replace you

and come to the summer
cottage! It’s urgent!
What has happened?
Something has happened! Come!
Did they steal anything?
What can one steal here?
Kolya has come. He’ll sort it out.
You called Kolya, didn’t you?
Whom should I have called?
The police, mum!
The lock was opened professionally!
Homeless people don’t work like this!

It’s not the first
case of burglary here.

They searched everywhere
but didn’t take anything.

Is there some kind of
a hiding place here?

What hiding place, Kolya?
Sergey had a safe in the cottage.
He didn’t have any hiding places.

But somebody is looking
for something here.

And that somebody knew
you or your husband!
I saw Borya in the cellar at night.
If I were you I wouldn’t come here

for some time until
I have it sorted out.
What are you going to do?
I’m going to get some information.

Your father’s company was
repairing roads. Boris left.
There was no money. Your father died.

Then Lavrenteyev’s company
started repairing roads.

Boris came back and
Lavrentyev got murdered.
It’s a very bad coincidence.
Hi!

Borya! I almost fell
down! And you save me!

You’re a real prince!
A prince! Take this!

Prince Borya! I almost
fell and you saved me!

Why don’t you answer my lawyer’s
calls? He can’t reach you.
What for?

You may not want to meet
him but you’ll have to!
What for?

The court may divorce us
even without your presence.

Borya, I know. Come
here. Give me your hand.
Borya, give me your hand!
Vika, what did you come for?
As you wish. I may stand up myself.

I may do anything myself. Borya,
I won’t meet without lawyer.

And I won’t come here
again. Do you know why?
I’m sick and tired of it!
Borya, I came to bid farewell.
This is true!

Forgive me for everything,
will you? For everything!
It’s forgotten.
Chao! Prince…
Kolya, hello.
Hi. Shall we go?
Kolya?
You were right.
What are you talking about?

Do you remember what
you and Turkin told me?
It was true.
Let’s start from where we stopped.
No, Kolya. I have to sort it all out.
Don’t hurry me up, OK?
Thank you for the help!

Don’t be a fool. We may
come to an agreement.
About what? You’re holding what I need.
I have the half of the papers at home.
Put them on a sack and step aside.
Borya?
Boris? What are you doing here?
Why was the door open?
Did you kill him?

He is alive! He is alive!
Oxana, listen to me.
This man killed your father.

This CD has an answer to all
the questions! Let’s go inside!

Let’s go, you’ll see it for
yourself! Come on, be quick,
before he has come to his senses. Run!
Come on!
You shall sign each page.

The boss hopes that this
money will be enough.
Tell your Turkin that this is too much!

If I get behind the bars
I won’t keep silence!
I have all the copies, all the accounts!

Sign! If you try to speak
up you’ll have problems!
Both you and your family!

What a fool! You won’t
find the documents anyway!

Your father never stole any
money. He was just trapped.

He wanted to close the company, take you
and your mother and leave!

I knew about the papers
and the videos!

I came back to
get them to make them pay for it!
Forgive me!
Stay here. Don’t go out!
Give the phone to Turkin!
It’s urgent!
Hello? Hello, I’m listening!
Borya?
Yes?

I’m coming! Are we still making
photos? I was standing here.
Everything is ready. Do you like it?
You made it so fast!

I‘ve been in love with
you for a long time.
Something is missing.
Oh, yes! A sable!
Stop!

title: Мечты из Пластилина / Dreams in Plasticine. Фильм. StarMedia. Фильмы о Любви. Мелодрама. 2012

comments.text: Девочку выбрали совсем не похожую на Климову...﻿
comments.author: Dar777ija

comments.text: Больше всего понравился кот на фоне рыбки﻿
comments.author: Andrey & Inna Kryvitskie

comments.text:
Не знаю кто в их семье поставил условие-сниматься в месте.Но если в титрах 
Климова и Петренко-садитесь по удобней все на 5++++.Рекомендую "Отмена всех 
ограничений" и "Каждого своя война"﻿
comments.author: Андрей Даниленко

comments.text: Фильм очень понравился! И актёры сыграли замечательно.﻿
comments.author: Полинка Глущенко

comments.text:
Секретарша - трубочист с накладными буклями отвратного качества! 
 Непонятно, на что запали эти мужики!
Ну, наверно, это стереотип, раз секретарша, значит обязательно любовница. 
Удобно, под боком в любой момент.﻿
comments.author: Sonny HB

comments.text: Игра актёров и сюжет великолепны !!! Красивая сказка !!! 4 с + !!!﻿
comments.author: Вадим Розенберг

comments.text: a u direktora odin glaz korichnevi a durigoi zeleni, ili mne pokazalos?﻿
comments.author: Eka terine

comments.text:
Сюжет фильма- слишком занузданная тема, и неправдоподобная.
Вике повезло ее полюбил Борис, сексопильный красивый, мужчина, а она любит 
старого урода.
Смешно.
Надо было поменять местами актеров, а актрису подобрать получше.
Борис с такими данными не может влюбиться в такую замухрышку.
С первых минут фильм уже не понравился.
Когда в жизни на одного мужчину 10 красавиц, как то странно смотреть, что 
некрасивая женщина в парике изменяет очень красивому мужику с уродом.
Когда пишут сценарии посмотрите вокруг жизнь бьет ключом, очень много 
сюжетов из жизни можно взять, тогда фильмы не будут похожи друг на друга 
как под копиркой﻿
comments.author: illarion6

comments.text:
8-летняя Оксана, повзрослев на 10 лет, превратилась в 34-летнюю Катю 
Климову? (Строго говоря, возраст Оксаны-в-детстве  больше тянет лет на 
11-13, чем на восемь. На страничке фильма вконтакте  так и сказано: возраст 
героини - 12 лет. В фильме 2014 года "Одинок по контракту" Саша Киреева 
выглядит уже старшеклассницей. 
http://ru.samotniy.novy.tv/userfiles/Film_2.jpg) Два года прошло.

Кроме того, Катя Климова и Игорь Петренко в реальной жизни - ровесники, и 
играть любовников с 16-летней разницей в возрасте им не комильфо.﻿
comments.author: Barbara H.

comments.text:
А вот и сам фильм "Мечты из пластилина"! Что может быть лучше позитивного 
фильма в выходной день?

Мечты Из Пластилина. Фильм. StarMedia. Мелодрама.﻿
comments.author: Star Media

comments.text: a zamok iz plastilina, eto ge navernoe ochen dolgo i trudno bilo lepit...
comments.author: Sveta Kontorska

comments.text: krasivii film osobenno kogda koshka s ribkoi vmeste...
comments.author: Sveta Kontorska
